channel.title: Can som1 help me with my port forwarding
channel.description: pownd told me that in order for me friends to be able to go on my server i have to port forward my router. i did exactly what he told me till the point he logged out so i am stuck here now: [IMG]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/6272/screen1cr.jpg[/img] how do i port forward from here? help plz. ty[br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 11:51:24 PM[/size][hr]kk i looked :How to port forward on google and i got something, i selected my router version, now i need to select a program... how?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 13, 2006, 12:15:06 AM[/size][hr]which one?
